column4: I hate to ask again, but I'll post it one more time... When Selecting OSS From the Multimedia Systems Selector and Testing, I get an error: Failed to construct test pipeline for 'OSS - Open Sound System'  Any Ideas? Sorry to Pest...
What that most likely means is that your sound card is simply not working out with linux.  Have you tried selecting Alsa?
There's also a kernel driver that emulates OSS using Alsa
